text: (Ebyo ebyogeddwa waggulu bimala okumatiza omuntu) Ssi ggwe ovunaanyizibwa ku kulungama kwaabwe, wabula Katonda alungamya oyo gwaba ayagadde, buli kirungi kyemuwaayo kigasa mmwe, (nga abakkiriza) buli kyonna kyemuwaayo mugenderera kudda eri Katonda, buli kirungi kyonna kyemuwaayo kigenda kubasasulwa mu bujjuvu era temugenda kulyazaamanyizibwa
